title: AlmaLinux Announces Solution to RHEL Source Code Conundrum
description:
The AlmaLinux Foundation made public its plans to continue to develop and maintain its RHEL clone without access to Red Hat’s source code.

The post AlmaLinux Announces Solution to RHEL Source Code Conundrum appeared first on Linux Today.

title: CVSS 4.0 Assesses Real-Time Threat, Impact of Vulnerabilities
description:
FIRST has unveiled the latest version of its Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS 4.0). Learn more here.

The post CVSS 4.0 Assesses Real-Time Threat, Impact of Vulnerabilities appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Istio Service Mesh Hits Milestone (Years After It Should Have)
description:
The open-source Istio service mesh project is hitting a major milestone, as it officially graduates to be a full project at the CNCF.

The post Istio Service Mesh Hits Milestone (Years After It Should Have) appeared first on Linux Today.
